United States Court of Appeals
                       For the First Circuit

No. 06-1136

                  IN RE: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                            Petitioner.




                               ERRATA

          The opinion of this court, issued March 24, 2006,
should be amended as follows:


page 2, line 1:   replace "Per Curiam" with "LYNCH, Circuit Judge"
